content: NCT 45 S-22 ACSR and guy wire cordless cable cutter Guillotine-style cordless hydraulic cable cutter with larger cutting capacity for ACSR cable and guy wire (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Pipe press tools, cutters, and crimpers- -
